name: SoundsofWater
0:
”Alexa open sounds of water”
”Alexa ask sounds of water to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sounds of water
des: Fall into a deep sleep with our dreamy and water sounds. Sounds of Water is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Sounds of Water, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
